blogPost.title: What are some of the biggest challenges direct-to-consumer brands are facing right now? Answer by Lee Hnetinka, Founder at @darkstore and @FastAF. https://t.co/SljspiExvB https://t.co/gL9Z49iIIq
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: ダイレクト・トゥ・コンシューマー・ブランドが今直面している最大の課題は何ですか？Answer by Lee Hnetinka, Founder at @darkstore and @FastAF. https://t.co/SljspiExvB https://t.co/gL9Z49iIIq
直接面向消费者的品牌目前面临的最大挑战是什么？由@darkstore和@FastAF的创始人Lee Hnetinka回答。https://t.co/SljspiExvB https://t.co/gL9Z49iIIq
直接面向消費者的品牌目前面臨的最大挑戰是什麼？由@darkstore和@FastAF的創始人Lee Hnetinka回答。https://t.co/SljspiExvB https://t.co/gL9Z49iIIq
